verses.name: Psalms 37:1
verses.text: Fret not thyself because of evildoers, neither be thou envious against the workers of iniquity.

verses.name: Psalms 37:2
verses.text: For they shall soon be cut down like the grass, and wither as the green herb.

verses.name: Psalms 37:3
verses.text: Trust in the Lord, and do good; so shalt thou dwell in the land, and verily thou shalt be fed.

verses.name: Psalms 37:4
verses.text: Delight thyself also in the Lord; and he shall give thee the desires of thine heart.

verses.name: Psalms 37:5
verses.text: Commit thy way unto the Lord; trust also in him; and he shall bring it to pass.

verses.name: Psalms 37:6
verses.text: And he shall bring forth thy righteousness as the light, and thy judgment as the noonday.

verses.name: Psalms 37:7
verses.text: Rest in the Lord, and wait patiently for him: fret not thyself because of him who prospereth in his way, because of the man who bringeth wicked devices to pass.

verses.name: Psalms 37:8
verses.text: Cease from anger, and forsake wrath: fret not thyself in any wise to do evil.

verses.name: Psalms 37:9
verses.text: For evildoers shall be cut off: but those that wait upon the Lord, they shall inherit the earth.

verses.name: Psalms 37:10
verses.text: For yet a little while, and the wicked shall not be: yea, thou shalt diligently consider his place, and it shall not be.

verses.name: Psalms 37:11
verses.text: But the meek shall inherit the earth; and shall delight themselves in the abundance of peace.

verses.name: Psalms 37:12
verses.text: The wicked plotteth against the just, and gnasheth upon him with his teeth.

verses.name: Psalms 37:13
verses.text: The Lord shall laugh at him: for he seeth that his day is coming.

verses.name: Psalms 37:14
verses.text: The wicked have drawn out the sword, and have bent their bow, to cast down the poor and needy, and to slay such as be of upright conversation.

verses.name: Psalms 37:15
verses.text: Their sword shall enter into their own heart, and their bows shall be broken.

verses.name: Psalms 37:16
verses.text: A little that a righteous man hath is better than the riches of many wicked.

verses.name: Psalms 37:17
verses.text: For the arms of the wicked shall be broken: but the Lord upholdeth the righteous.

verses.name: Psalms 37:18
verses.text: The Lord knoweth the days of the upright: and their inheritance shall be for ever.

verses.name: Psalms 37:19
verses.text: They shall not be ashamed in the evil time: and in the days of famine they shall be satisfied.

verses.name: Psalms 37:20
verses.text: But the wicked shall perish, and the enemies of the Lord shall be as the fat of lambs: they shall consume; into smoke shall they consume away.

verses.name: Psalms 37:21
verses.text: The wicked borroweth, and payeth not again: but the righteous sheweth mercy, and giveth.

verses.name: Psalms 37:22
verses.text: For such as be blessed of him shall inherit the earth; and they that be cursed of him shall be cut off.

verses.name: Psalms 37:23
verses.text: The steps of a good man are ordered by the Lord: and he delighteth in his way.

verses.name: Psalms 37:24
verses.text: Though he fall, he shall not be utterly cast down: for the Lord upholdeth him with his hand.

verses.name: Psalms 37:25
verses.text: I have been young, and now am old; yet have I not seen the righteous forsaken, nor his seed begging bread.

verses.name: Psalms 37:26
verses.text: He is ever merciful, and lendeth; and his seed is blessed.

verses.name: Psalms 37:27
verses.text: Depart from evil, and do good; and dwell for evermore.

verses.name: Psalms 37:28
verses.text: For the Lord loveth judgment, and forsaketh not his saints; they are preserved for ever: but the seed of the wicked shall be cut off.

verses.name: Psalms 37:29
verses.text: The righteous shall inherit the land, and dwell therein for ever.

verses.name: Psalms 37:30
verses.text: The mouth of the righteous speaketh wisdom, and his tongue talketh of judgment.

verses.name: Psalms 37:31
verses.text: The law of his God is in his heart; none of his steps shall slide.

verses.name: Psalms 37:32
verses.text: The wicked watcheth the righteous, and seeketh to slay him.

verses.name: Psalms 37:33
verses.text: The Lord will not leave him in his hand, nor condemn him when he is judged.

verses.name: Psalms 37:34
verses.text: Wait on the Lord, and keep his way, and he shall exalt thee to inherit the land: when the wicked are cut off, thou shalt see it.

verses.name: Psalms 37:35
verses.text: I have seen the wicked in great power, and spreading himself like a green bay tree.

verses.name: Psalms 37:36
verses.text: Yet he passed away, and, lo, he was not: yea, I sought him, but he could not be found.

verses.name: Psalms 37:37
verses.text: Mark the perfect man, and behold the upright: for the end of that man is peace.

verses.name: Psalms 37:38
verses.text: But the transgressors shall be destroyed together: the end of the wicked shall be cut off.

verses.name: Psalms 37:39
verses.text: But the salvation of the righteous is of the Lord: he is their strength in the time of trouble.

verses.name: Psalms 37:40
verses.text: And the Lord shall help them, and deliver them: he shall deliver them from the wicked, and save them, because they trust in him.
